folder: Pierrepont Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Pierrepont Street, at the N.E. corner of Hicks Street. A view of the Samuel Mc Lean house prior to 1908. In 1908 the Florence Court, an apartment building, was erected on the site, and still stands in 1936.
1904.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

folder: Pierrepont Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Pierrepont Street, north side, at, adjoining and west of Hicks Street. Also seen is 176-178 Hicks Street, west side, north of Pierrepont Street. No. 43 Pierrepont Street, is the corner house, and in 1892 was known as the Carll Hyde de Silver house. Now (1922) occupied by Dr. Bierhauer.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

folder: Pierrepont Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Pierrepont Street, west from Hicks Street, to the East River.
June 11, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: Hicks Street & Pierrepont Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Hicks Street, west side, at Pierrepont Street. The tree was planted by the highways division of the W. P. A.
June 17, 1936
Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project
